first_translate: when I hold your hand...
unlike you, I think about more than that.
at first, I want to hug you... touch you...
and then after that--
huh?
wait,
w-wait a second... is this what I think it is?
mm
come on, fiona. snap out of it.
goodness...
it wasn’t a kiss!
uh, so...
let me get this straight...

hangle: 나랑 성적인 의미로 이것저것 하고 싶다?
first_translate: do you wanna do things like that with me for real?
I’ve been thinking since last time,

hangle: 좀 더 그럴듯하게 정리할 수는 없어?
first_translate: but can’t you put it into better words?

hangle: 아니면 진짜 내 말이 그렇게 들린 거야?
first_translate: or did my question really sound like that?
hmm...

hangle: 그런 그냥 네 젊은 날의 본능에 따른 거니,
first_translate: is it just because of your youthful instincts,
or...
fiona.

hangle: 내가 여자만 보면 눈 돌아가는 한심한 놈처럼 보여?
first_translate: does it seem like I’m some pathetic guy whose eyes spin at every woman he sees?
no, it’s only because it's you.
to be exact,
it’s only you.
is this... a confession?
yep.
this is a confession.
I have feelings for you,
fiona.
siegren...
take your time.
you don’t need to rush anything.
the reason why I confessed now was because...
...other guys might take you away from me if I didn’t hurry up.
alrighty, then.
night, fiona.
th-this isn’t...
a dream, right?!!
I couldn’t sleep all night.

hangle: 어젯밤 일이 역시 꿈이 아니었던 거겠지…
first_translate: that must mean everything that happened yesterday wasn’t a dream either...
fiona.
something clearly went down between you and sieg last night.
how’d you know?
i-it didn’t.
then which one is it?
what are you talking about?
first option: someone made a confession to you.
second option:

hangle: 시그렌이 네가 불쾌할 만한 짓을 했다.
first_translate: sieg did something inappropriate to make you uncomfortable.
if it’s the former, we’ll let him live.
but if it’s the latter, his death will look like a natural cause.
who are you referring to?
siegren?
o-oh, it’s the first option!
really?
why does your face say otherwise?
even though that may be the case,

hangle: 너라면 고백을 들어도 평소처럼 웃으면서 차버릴 줄 알았는데.
first_translate: I thought you would reject him as usual while smiling.
I'm not heartless enough to do such a thing.

hangle: 그러면 고백 정도는 알아서 해결해 봐라.
first_translate: in any case, figure it out yourself.

hangle: 그 이상이면 내가 처리해 줄 테니.
first_translate: if there’s anything else, I'll handle it myself.
right, but that doesn’t include killing off siegren...
shoot...
all of this is because of siegren.

hangle: 자연사 위장 운운하는 아벨에게 상담할 수도 없고.
first_translate: now I won’t even be able to ask abel for advice when he talks about making deaths appear as accidents.

hangle: 지금쯤이면 유니스와 서서히 연인이 되어야 하는 시점일 텐데.
first_translate: I should slowly start developing romantic feelings toward eunice by now too.
but instead, siegren goes ahead and confesses to me.

hangle: 내가 그렇게 열심히 운명적인 사랑을 써 놨는데!
first_translate: I worked so hard writing our destined love story together!

hangle: ‘왜 유니스를 안 좋아해’ 라고 물을 수도 없고!
first_translate: not to mention how I can’t tell her “why aren’t you falling for eunice” anymore!

hangle: 시그렌은 대체 왜 날 좋아하는 거지?
first_translate: just why does siegren like me anyway?
we were good friends before.

hangle: 아니, 더 정확히는 내가 시그렌의 좋은 친구로 있고 싶었어.
first_translate: no, actually... I wanted us to become close friends.

hangle: 그게 어린 시그렌에게 정서적으로 도움이 될 거라 생각했으니까.
first_translate: I figured being friendly with young siegren back then could help emotionally support him.

hangle: …돌이켜 보면 결국 모든 게 내 알량한 만족을 채우기 위한 것이었을지도.
first_translate: looking back, maybe I did all those things to satisfy myself.

hangle: 시그렌에게 잘 대해 주면서 정도 들고, 나름대로 내 죄책감도 덜었었지.
first_translate: while treating sieg well, I felt less guilty about my actions.
of course, I wish for siegren’s happiness,

hangle: 딱히 그를 온전하게 진심 어린 우정으로 대하고 있던 건 아니었어.
first_translate: but I never treated him wholeheartedly or sincerely befriended him.

hangle: 이런 내 위선을 모르고 시그렌이 반했다면 미안한 일이야.
first_translate: if sieg fell for me without knowing about my hypocrisy, I feel sorry for him.

hangle: 그리고 상황 자체도 고민할 여지가 있어.
first_translate: on top of that, I also gotta worry about the situation itself.

hangle: 내 입장에서는 원작의 흐름대로 가도 문제고, 안 가도 문제잖아.
first_translate: from where I stand, whether I follow the original plotline or not, both options pose problems.

hangle: 전자라면 당연히 내 결말은 영혼까지 고통받는 베드 엔딩이지.
first_translate: obviously, following the novel leads to a bad ending where I suffer until my soul disappears completely.
as for the other choice, several issues arise here too...

hangle: 후에 어둠은 계속 나타나고, 마물의 흉포화는 더욱 많이 진행될 거란 거지.
first_translate: for starters, darkness continues to emerge later on, causing monsters to grow stronger.

hangle: 결국 시간이 지나면 막을 수 없을 게 분명해.
first_translate: 085eventually, no matter what happens, they’re bound to win over everyone.

hangle: 어둠을 없애려면 유니스가 가진 힘이 필수인데,
first_translate: in order to eliminate the darkness, eunice’s power is essential.

hangle: 그 유니스의 힘을 본격적으로 각성시키는 계기가 바로 시그렌과의 사랑이라고~!
first_translate: but the catalyst behind awakening eunice’s powers is none other than her romance with sieg!

hangle: 시그렌과 이어지지 않은 유니스가 영영 자신의 힘을 각성하지 못한다면…
first_translate: if eunice fails to awaken her own strength due to not getting involved with sieg,
the world might end up perishing.

hangle: 유니스와 시그렌의 힘으로 어둠을 어느 정도 몰아내지만,
first_translate: with their combined forces, eunice and sieg manage to push the darkness away somewhat.

hangle: 내가 죽지는 않는 결말… 같은 건 불가능할까.
first_translate: but is it possible to create an alternate ending where I survive...?

hangle: 아니, 그보다도 당장 눈앞에 닥친 일이 문제야~!
first_translate: wait, forget that. the problem lies elsewhere!

hangle: 시그렌한테 고백받은 거 어떻게 할 거냐구~
first_translate: what am I gonna do about siegren’s confession?!

hangle: 생각해보면 결혼하자는 이야기를 들은 것도 아니고,
first_translate: technically speaking, he didn’t propose marriage yet.
he simply confessed.
should I swallow my tears and flat-out turn him down?
fiona, are you home?
